answers.answer: If it's not water that your drinking try to drink just water till the feeling goes away. If you are drinking water and you still feel this way it's time to see a doctore you may need IV fluids to bring you back hydrated.

thrush and cotton mouth is a symptom of pregnancy...i had it for a week and i literally had to drink 4liters of water before that feeling went away. also if your due in may your coming up to being 24-28 wks i would assume. your gestational diabetes screen should be coming up. if its still not for a few weeks consider asking your dr or midwife for the screening early. although gestesinal diabetes tends to have zero symptoms a common one to have is extreme thurst if you were to have any, may not be a bad idea to get checked for the piece of mind. and just avoid drinking anything but water and just drink tones of it, watch your pee if its clear or almost clear then you know your hydrated! good luck mama!
